snippet: The five additions to the firm’s influential management committee, a group of Goldman insiders that has the ear of the bank’s top brass, bring the total number of members to 34, the largest it’s ever been.
abstract: The five additions to the firm’s influential management committee, a group of Goldman insiders that has the ear of the bank’s top brass, bring the total number of members to 34, the largest it’s ever been.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Adds Five to Management Committee
